sj_v0.1.10.description:
Due to this apworld containing derivative work if you want to share this apworld you must not post the file directly in the main Archipelago discord server and instead post a link to this github release

If you would like to at any time fully remove this apworld and its derivative content you must also delete the `super_junkoid_randomizer` folder from the lib folder in your Archipelago install as this is pulled from the apworld and contains the `Super Junkoid 1.3.ips` patch file

### Changes

- Fixed logic for Fake Map Heart
- Fixed Client on AP 0.6.2
sj_v0.1.10.title: Super Junkoid AP v0.1.10

sj_v0.1.7.description:
Due to this apworld containing derivative work if you want to share this apworld you must not post the file directly in the main Archipelago discord server and instead post a link to this github release

If you would like to at any time fully remove this apworld and its derivative content you must also delete the `super_junkoid_randomizer` folder from the lib folder in your Archipelago install as this is pulled from the apworld and contains the `Super Junkoid 1.3.ips` patch file

### Changes

- The intro is now skipped
- Added a new option `fast_sheol` to skip the slower parts of the final area
sj_v0.1.7.title: Super Junkoid AP v0.1.7

sj_v0.1.8.description:
Due to this apworld containing derivative work if you want to share this apworld you must not post the file directly in the main Archipelago discord server and instead post a link to this github release

If you would like to at any time fully remove this apworld and its derivative content you must also delete the `super_junkoid_randomizer` folder from the lib folder in your Archipelago install as this is pulled from the apworld and contains the `Super Junkoid 1.3.ips` patch file

### Changes

- Fixed logic for exiting Blood Bethel
- Removed Rat Burst Requirement for parts of Deep Purple
- Added logic for entering Blood Bethel and Ice Castle from False Idol
- Reverted the change to skip the intro as it was causing issues with creating new save files in the event of a softlock
sj_v0.1.8.title: Super Junkoid AP v0.1.8

sj_v0.1.9.description:
Due to this apworld containing derivative work if you want to share this apworld you must not post the file directly in the main Archipelago discord server and instead post a link to this github release

If you would like to at any time fully remove this apworld and its derivative content you must also delete the `super_junkoid_randomizer` folder from the lib folder in your Archipelago install as this is pulled from the apworld and contains the `Super Junkoid 1.3.ips` patch file

### Changes

- Fixed Logic for Toxic Heart and Mother Brain Sparksuit
- Improved Logic for Lower Outskirts
- Added Magic Bolts and Hearts to the filler pool for replacing items
sj_v0.1.9.title: Super Junkoid AP v0.1.9
